```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyr)

library(nflreadr)

# Read data
qb_regular_season_stats <- 
  load_player_stats(seasons = TRUE) |> 
  filter(season_type == "REG" & position == "QB")

qb_regular_season_stats

qb_data <- qb_regular_season_stats %>%
  filter(position == "QB", week <= 14, season == 2023 )
```

```{r, include=FALSE}

  select(rushing_yards, carries, rushing_yards) %>%
```
